text:
Sophie, Countess of Wessex (aka Sophie Helen Rhys-Jones; born 20 January 1965) is the wife of Prince Edward, Earl of Wessex. She assists her husband in his royal duties. She married him in 1999.
Rhys-Jones was born at John Radcliffe Hospital in Oxford, She was daughter of Christopher Rhys Jones and Mary,
She was raised in Brenchley, Kent, She married with Prince Edward, Earl of Wessex in 1999, They have two children, Lady Louise Windsor and James, Viscount Severn, They are lived in Bagshot Park in Surrey.
